app.name: Retro Launcher
app.long_description:
Launcher for RetroArch cores. Mod of the Homebrew Launcher by Dimok. Credits to Dimok and the RetroArch developers.
You have to put the cores to sd:/wiiu/retro/*. To simply go back to the Hbl, just put a copy of the homebrew_launcher in the retro directory.
Uses version 1.4 of HBL
